subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Alex Ferguson has warmed up to the last weekend of 2011 with two 5-0 victories, and a third on Saturday could take his team to where it started the year: alone atop the Premier League.
snippet: Alex Ferguson has warmed up to the last weekend of 2011 with two 5-0 victories, and a third on Saturday could take his team to where it started the year: alone atop the Premier League.
